name: Mini for two.
desc: Spacious and comfortable, this modern furnished room offers a double-size bed and breathtaking views.

name: Vip for two
desc: Spacious and comfortable, this modern furnished room offers a king-size bed and breathtaking views.

name: Vip for family
desc: If you want a little extra from your stay, you might like our superior rooms. With double doors opening onto a private terrace, you will enjoy spectacular views of our pristine beach.

name: Vip for friends
desc: For large groups of friends or families to enjoy spectacular views of our pristine beach.
